author: Chelsea Peng
title: Who Was Scarlett Johansson's Mystery Oscars Date? - Who Did Scarlett Johansson Take to the 2017 Oscars?
text: By Chelsea Peng Feb 26, 2017 When Scarlett Johansson strolled onto the Oscars 2017 red carpet Sunday evening, some of us were like, "Is that an Alaïa?" ( It was —a totally important designer.) Then, in regard to the well-bronzed man onto whose arm she was clinging, we were like, "Oh. Who's that?" Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Answer: talent agent Joe Machota, who's been head of CAA's theater department since 2013. According to Vanity Fair , the former actor has been instrumental in leading his clients—including Jim Parsons, Zachary Quinto, and, yes, Johansson—to box-office success. Getty Johansson might be single at the moment, having reportedly separated from husband Romain Dauriac "since the summer." 樂樂樂 Intriguing.
